iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
mutating func encodePredicateExpression<T, each Input>(
    _ expression: T,
    variable: repeat PredicateExpressions.Variable<each Input>,
    predicateConfiguration: PredicateCodableConfiguration
) throws where T : PredicateExpression, T : Encodable, T.Output == Bool
```
